posts.post_content: Sorry, BalonyPony, that combo requires 11 cards in two turns without draw effects. How about: 2 [Black Lotus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Black Lotus), 3 [Lightning Bolt](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lightning Bolt), [Yawgmoth's Will](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Yawgmoth's Will), return both Lotuses, play all 3 Bolts again, sac the other Lotus and play Grizzly Bears. 2nd turn kill!
